entry.title: PRE-EVACUATION WARNING
entry.summary: The Lincoln County Sheriff has issued a pre-evacuation warning for all zones in the West Kootenai area. There is a good probability of a need to evacuate. It is recommended to move any people requiring extraordinary care, large mobile property, and livestock (if feasible and deemed necessary). Beginning Saturday morning (9/2/2017), Law Enforcement will be going door to door throughout the West Kootenai to insure all residents are aware of the Pre-Evacuation

entry.title: West Kootenai Public Meeting on 9/2 at 7:30
entry.summary: An information meeting for the West Kootenai community will be held on Saturday, September 2nd at 7:30 pm at the Kootenai Store deck. There will be an update on the Caribou Fire status. Also, a representative from the Lincoln County Sherriff's Office will discuss evacuation
